DialogueText:
Tell you what if you find out who ran off with my Stamps I think I may be able to set up a business with you!
QUEST:Find out who stole the Stamp Collection

Find who stole my Stamps and I can do business with you!
QUEST:Find out who stole the Stamp Collection they're in the Frog map...

Care to give it a try? I'd do it myself but I wouldn't want to embarass a beginner like you!
QUEST:Chop down that Tree and collect 10 Oak Logs!

Care to give it a try? I'd do it myself but I wouldn't want to embarass a beginner like you!
QUEST:Collect 10 Oak Logs!

Hit tree with sharp hammer. Make gravity in tree go brrrr.
QUEST:Bring 1000 logs... you should come back to this quest later once you have a higher Log Carry Capacity!

Hit tree with sharp hammer. Make gravity in tree go brrrr.
QUEST:Bring 1000 logs. You'll need a large Log Carry Cap.

See how your tree over there is a tree and mine here is... well not a tree anymore? Please make yours a bit more like mine.
QUEST:Turn the tree into the absence of a tree and get 100 Oak Logs.

See how your tree over there is a tree and mine here is... well not a tree anymore? Please make yours a bit more like mine.
QUEST:Collect 100 Oak Logs.

Actually before you take off can ya get me some exotic logs? If you get a MASSIVE highscore in the minigame rare logs will come out! Go on try getting one!
QUEST: Get a Forest Log by earning a choppin' highscore of 150!

Actually before you take off can ya get me some exotic logs? There's a 1 in a billion chance of getting one from this tree!
QUEST: Get a Forest Log from a different tree found at the end of the world.

Well come on now I aint gonna give you part of my stash here for nothin'. This is a picnic basket not a charity house! Bring me something and maybe we can fix up a deal...
QUEST:Buy and bring 20 Nomwiches from the Town Shop.

Well come on now I aint gonna give you part of my stash here for nothin'. This is a picnic basket not a charity house! Bring me something and maybe we can fix up a deal...
QUEST:Bring a Nomwich buy them from the Shop in town.
